summary: The Bundesliga is the top football league in Germany, featuring 18 teams. It runs from August to May, with matches on Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays. The winner qualifies for the DFL-Supercup, and the league operates with promotion and relegation. Bayern Munich is the most successful club, winning 32 titles. The Bundesliga is ranked fourth in Europe and has produced many champions. It has a global audience, broadcast in over 200 countries, and is known for high attendance, second only to the NFL. Founded in 1962, it is now run by the Deutsche Fu√üball Liga.
title: Bundesliga
